content.detailedDescription: Walking dog, looked up and noticed normal plane flying in westwardly direction. suddenly out of nowhere it was as if a star had dropped from the sky and was very low overhead. within bow and arrow shot distance.  it was about the size of a basketball and looked just like a star or planet and moved over from my west to the east directly above me.  i was stunned, as i watched it for 30 seconds approximately and then suddenly vanish while still in plain view. didn't shoot off or fly fast just moved totally silently and smoothly and vanished as if it were turned off.  went inside, grabbed a cigarette went back outside at approximately six forty two and for the next twenty minutes six or seven planes flew in the exact path that i had seen the object, circled and flew again.  planes have continued flying overhead and it is nearly eight o clock. this was not a plane. one huge starlike light. starlike is the best way i can describe it. it was phenomenal. totally rattled me. i'm still pumping with adrenaline.
content.summary: Large starlike light flew right overhead at medium pace 30 seconds w/e then disappeared

content.detailedDescription:
This ufo is the brightest object in the sky:
doing all kinds of jirations, disappearing & then reappearing,going round in ciecles, up down, sideways, you name it.Sometimes it diappears then reappears-----no clouds in the sky:-------
would like toknow what it is????????????
e-mail me at ([email removed/cms/tg]]):
note: e-mail address is correct **********

thank you,
[name removed/cms/tg]

note: previously seen many times:
will try to photo it:
content.summary: Continus sighting every night, sometimes at different times:

content.detailedDescription: I took a trip during christmas to los angeles with my friends family. my mom had never been either so i was randomly taking pictures to send to her. these were taken from our rental car with my iphone 4. i didn't realize until i got back home from the trip that i had possibly captured a ufo. the first three are in succession and even have a highway marker. oddly, the fourth was taken an hour or so later after a couple quick sight seeing stops. i'd love any feed back. thanks for your time.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Unknown
content.summary: Bell shape plain view

content.detailedDescription: Was taking my dog out. checked both ways before crossing the street to my mailbox and saw what looked like a bright shooting star over the east horizon. only then i saw it streak closer. and closer again, just behind the pine trees (so not simply street lights reflecting off the power lines, which are in front of the trees). this was all traveling west, but then it took several sharp directional changes--a streak north, toward me, then southwest, north again (i had to look over my right shoulder to follow it here as it was well behind and across the street), then a couple quick changes, by now west and paralleling the coastline, then one more sharp turn south and out of sight. this was too high to see anything but the light trail, obviously very high. a couple minutes later, a huge, low-flying plane (i assume military from macdill afb) came lumbering south, which was a stark contrast to the higher and incredibly faster object i'd just seen. no opportunity to try to catch it on my phone as the whole thing only took about a minute and traveled too fast to capture. this was clearly not a natural phenomenon, given the incredible flight path. i didn't sense anything from it, just my own awe to have seen something so elegant. i only wish i had a better grasp of distance. here on the west coast of florida, the challenger explosion looked like it was maybe five miles away. this obviously covered a huge distance in a very short period of time as the flight reached east to west horizons before it turned south and out of sight.
content.summary: Shooting star, zigzagged e to w horizons with many  course changes, then straight s

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting in my 4th floor apartment living room, watching television when the sound of a heavy, large helicopter was approaching from the south.  usually this wouldn't have gotten my attention but the sound was approaching very slowly and when it sounded as if the helicopter was virtually about to hover over the apartment complex, i got up and looked out my west facing living room window. i observed what appeared and sounded like a military style and the helicopter was following, very slowly following, an object that was a long, narrow triangular shape and moving at the same rate of speed. i observed this until i couldn't see it in my viewpoint thru the window any longer (about 10-15 secs).  i could still hear the helicopter moving northeasterly after it was out of my sight.  the triangle object was much greater in size than the helicopter (6-8 times the size of the 'copter, possibly more).  the "object" was dark in color (as was the helicopter), had 2 glowing greyish/white lights in the rear and 1 light towards the front of the same color.  not beaming or flood type lights, just glowing.  in fact they glowed enough that it illuminated the underside of the "object" so that i could tell that "it" was triangular shaped (not just that the lights were placed in triangular positions).  it was also illuminated enough that i could see that the "object" had height and width.  the "object" was  dull blackish/gray color, similar to a black primer color.  the helicopter had flashing lights on it as one would expect it to have.  only difference being that i couldn't distinguish any markings on it, being it was also dark in color.
content.summary: Military sounding helicopter following closely behind triangle shape object

content.detailedDescription:
I have wanted to report this for 35 years and just didn't.  it was in my bucket list to do so, so here i am.  back in 1979, i was a geologist employed by the us army corps of engineers.  my job was to accompany drilling rigs hired by them to ensure the desired objective was met.  in this case, the objective was to locate cavernous areas underneath the railroad tracks that go through the military base.  when found, these areas would be filled with cement to enforce the ground underneath the tracks.  trains often went by.  my team & i had to have special permission to go onto the military base for this purpose.  our work hours were overnight, from about 11:00 pm through the morning.

on one particular night, the mayor of nearby southport, nc, eugene tomlinson, stopped by at around midnight to see how things were going.  he also was employed at the military base.  i came down off the embankment on which the train tracks are on, and we stood and chatted.  the only noise was from the drill rig, which wasn't that bad since the rock was soft.

soon he said to me, "what in the hell is that?" as he looked straight up.  i looked up and couldn't believe my eyeballs.  there was a perfectly triangular, pure black ship very slowly going along the track.  it had no lights at all.  in fact, if it weren't for the fact that the ship totally blotted out the sky above it, you couldn't see it.  but it was absolutely there.  i heard no sound from it; granted the drilling rig was running, i still don't believe it made a sound.  i stood and watched it as it slowly flew along the tracks and out of my sight.  i never saw anything come out of it.

i do not know if the guys on the drilling rig saw it; i don't think so, because not one of them said anything to me.  however, mr. tomlinson certainly saw the craft.

the weather was fine at the time; i don't believe we were even allowed to work if there was threatening weather.  in fact, i recall it being a starry night, and marveling at how the object blacked out the stars.

the clincher came 2 days later.  i had just gotten up and was having coffee and breakfast in a local restaurant.  they had a local newspaper available, which i picked up.  as i was eating, again my eyeballs popped out when i saw a little article about how local farmers were very annoyed by unexplained, triangular burn marks in their fields.  i recall no details from the article, which was very short anyway.  oh how i wish i had kept that newspaper; i did not.

i took no pictures.  i have nothing but my memory & and a notation in my diary of what i saw that night.  it is sharp, except for things like directions (n, s, e, w), time, etc.  i know it was the summer or early fall, because the weather was very warm.  also, it was impossible to say the distance to the craft or its size.  there was nothing to contrast it against.  however, it seemed to me to be flying "low." it didn't seem to be huge or anything.  sure was a perfect triangle.  not one light to be seen on it.  we had no phones, so i don't know if they would have been affected.  i never felt fear or threatened; only astonishment.

i am 100% certain that i saw a ufo that night.  i will never forget it.

i simply desire that my sighting be added to the history of sightings for that year and that place.  who knows?  maybe it'll help one day.
content.summary: Black triangle flew right over myself & others on the railroad track inside the military terminal

content.detailedDescription: On february 3, 2015, i was traveling by car, from deming, new mexico to tucson, az, on highway i-10 heading west.  in the sky about half of a mile south of the freeway i saw the side view of a blimp like object in the air, in front and just a bit below the top of the first hill on the deming side.  the object then moved above the hill and to the other side, and almost seemed to track with us for about 29 minutes.  there was also a car vs truck accident on the highway heading west that morning. when i first saw the object i thought it was as ufo, because i could see it close enough that it had no wings, or propellers, and it was not a blimp, because the have a rectangular shape coming out of the bottom center, and it hovered for a while before it moved.  my passenger tried to explain it as every air thing man has made, and then also agreed it was a ufo. she then looked up deming ufo on the internet, and found a story that described to the letter what was happening to us.  i was excited to see it and i did all i could to send it love from my heart.  i did as much as i could to communicate with it mentally.  i had a time frame to arrive in tucson, so we kept driving, and lost sight of the object.  my passenger tried to take pictures with her cell phone, but it did not come out.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Traveling on i-10 8:06 am i noticed an object up in the sky at the outskirts of deming nm.

content.detailedDescription: Looked out front window, saw a large object moving with red,and yellow lights flashing, pulsing. was moving fast at tree top level no sound.
content.summary: Looked out front window saw a large object moving very fast and flashing lights

content.detailedDescription: We were driving north on east lake road and approaching a stop light. i looked up at approximately 70 degrees and noticed a series of three bright white lights, there were no red aircraft lights. as we approached the stop light the view became obstructed by trees to the right of the road, after traveling another 40 yards the object reappeared approximately at the same location where it was first sighted, indicating it had not moved from the point where it was first sighted 10 seconds before. when the object was viewed the second time, both my wife and i believed it appeared stationary. there were no flashing or colored lights. there was no fuselage, only a boomerang shaped wing with a white light at the apex and one on each wing tip. we were in traffic and had to move as the light changed. we circled back which took about three minutes and the object was gone.I probably could have subtended the object with my extended hand. this is not a familiar flight path, it was dark except for street lights and a full moon which did not interfere with the sighting, however it may have served to back light the object and make the silhouette of the wing easy to see. the lights were large in proportion to the actual wing they appeared affixed to, making the proportions different than a passing aircraft. it was over in about 10 seconds or less, but it was really cool.
content.summary: Stationary bomerang with 3 white lights

content.detailedDescription: I was riding my bike from 72 ave onto 144 st when something told me to look up when i looked up in the sky i was shocked to see this beer big 3 foot ball game courses big silver matalic object hovering over head i was feeling scared right after the experience because a few years ago like in 2013 i had experienced my door light up really bright engulfing the hole door in the middle of the day with white light and at the bottom of the door that was closed 2 foot shadows  that's when i grabbed my samurai sword and stood my ground and opened the door but nothing was there looked all over the house but no one inside the house other then my self. back to the ufo it hovered over trees and then disappeared with out a trace it was so big that i could see the under carige of the ufo in question  my actual e mail is [email removed/cms/tg] your website wouldn't let me use my email mail
content.summary: 3 football strips big

content.detailedDescription: Google earth st. rt.327 approximately 1.2 miles past st. rt. 671. first big white farmhouse on the left.Since my initial report i have obtained more information on the time of actual google photo.
content.summary: Actually this is my second report mr.Harzant contacted me the very next day after my initial report very strange things have  happend could you contact me again.? don't know who else to confide in...It was a confirmation....

content.detailedDescription: I was asleep in my bed and i awoke to a weird buzzing sound. and i turned and looked and saw some kind of creature about 5ft 3 inches standing silently in my bathroom doorway staring down at me. he wore a blueish spacesuit of some kind and had black boots on up to his knees. the outfit covered the whole body except its neck and face which was horrible looking and very strange, he had a sad look on his face and it appeared like its skin was very wrinked or had a melted like appearance. at that point i yelled in terror scared for my life and tried to get away for some reason i couldnt move then i immediately passed out which id never do if im facing something like that ugly spaceman in my house. i think it knocked me out somehow even though he just stood still and didnt move towards me. i woke up about five hours later and it was gone. and i wasnt sure about reporting this but i thought after two days went by that maybe someone has seen this creature before. i pray i never see it ever again. i found a weird lump on my back around the shoulder blade that was never there before. and i have a weird pain in my shoulder now. it terrible these aliens can come in your home unannounced and late at night. that scares me alot. i havent slept since it occured, i now have a bat next to my bed and will sleep with one eye open. im not a good artist but im going to try and draw it ill never forget that ugly face. i also remember seeing a bright white glowing orb float past my bathroom window three days before this incident happened. i thought the orb was strange and didnt pay it any more mind. it was the size of a baseball and was very luminescent. light came off it like a tail and floated very much like a ghost and was silent. maybe thats how they find people. im no expert just a wild guess.
content.summary: I woke in in my bed hearing a sound and saw an entity standing nearby.

content.detailedDescription: Canal winchester, driving home from sinner with a friend. very startled but memorized by what ut was. something similar to wgat eveybody saw me invluded in phx, az
content.flightPath: Stationary,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Very oddine object. then from the one object three more appeared then it seem like it went back then back to four.

content.detailedDescription: Ufo was very fast look as moving star but kept a straight pattern very fast heading south east.
content.summary: This ufo flew at a high rate of speed

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were coming home from mcdonalds with dinner around 5:55 pm and my wife saw the bright white circle in the sky.  we had seen one a couple weeks prior and it seemed to follow us home.  there were 2 in the sky this time one followed us and hovered above the tree line and stayed there.  my mother and stepson saw it this time too because i ran in the house to get my binoculars.  my stepson noticed it was diamond shaped, his eyesight is better than mine.  it was very bright but looked like a circle without the binoculars.  before we got home one of the bright white ones was on my left side, driver side of the car.  my wife and i were watching and a reddish orange one appeared out of nowhere and appeared to crash to the ground at high speed.  after we all watched the hovering one for around 30 minutes ish we went in and had dinner and watched a movie.  we decided to go drive towards the one that crashed and the hovering white one was gone.  we also couldn't trace exactly where the other one went down.  it was exciting and scary at the same time.  we will continue to watch for them.  unfortunately my camera was not charged but i will have it on stand by now.
content.summary: 2 bright white orbs followed us. one appeared red orange streak plummeted to the ground.

content.detailedDescription: I was walking my wife home from work at 2 wish in the morning and saw a star close to the north of the moon looked like a star but it moved a tiny bit than hovered in place at first i thought i was crazy but had my wife look at it and she noticed it move too so the next day yesterday i tried seeing if the star was still near the moon and it was to cloudy for me to see it i looked today and it's not there anymore
content.summary: Sitting on north side of moon

content.detailedDescription:
I was visiting the va medical center in decatur, ga. it was on wednesday of last week at about 11:30 a.M.  i was parked on the topmost floor (#4) of the parking garage. i noticed chemtrails were being made over atlanta/decatur.. again.. it's pretty much a weekly occurrence. and i typically get out of my car to take photos of them. perhaps some day they will become a scrapbook.. because otherwise, no one that can do anything about them take them seriously anyway. after i cleaned the lens, i took about 4 photos using my nexus 4, with the default camera app. then put my smartphone back in my pocket, and went inside the facility for my daily appointment.

when i got home that afternoon i took a look at the photos. and wow.. 1st time i *ever* accidently caught a ufo in a photo. interesting thing is.. there are 2 photos of the same area of the sky.. about 3 seconds apart. now you see it.. now you don't. if it were something on the lens, it would have showed in both photos. not the case. the moon was on the opposite side of the sky, it wasn't full yet, and it was much larger than this object anyway. it was near noon.. so no stars were visible as well.. as you can see from the photos.

so.. my theory is.. it either cloaked.. or zipped into another dimension, wormhole, etc. and a footnote.. was it observing the chemtrails..?

;-)
content.summary: Stationary, near chemtrails. 3 second observation duration. glowing sphere.

content.detailedDescription: I was taking a walk around this lake near my house.  i am on the left hand side of the lake and i looked up and i just saw these flashing lights.  i though it was a plane but there were no red lights to go along with this big blue one i was seeing.  these lights kept jumping throughout the sky and i was very intrigued.  i thought i saw fly to the left of me, and i stopped recording, and it seemed to be going away.  i then looked back saw it stop, turn around and head back toward me as i was walking back toward my house, i get to the directly south of lake and i turned and it started to head right and then back straight toward me, which is when i started filming again.  it then followed me back, and i kept watching it as it turned and maneuvered.  i then got to the bridge less then 100 yards from my house and i see it and its moving over head and i can see its not a plane, the only reasonable non ufo object i think it could be was maybe a bird but it seemed way to high up to be a bird.  i followed over the treeline where again it stopped for a minute and headed further west away from me.
content.summary: Was on a night walk and saw a weird object i didnt know what it was so i watched it for a while

content.detailedDescription:
1. at the time of ufo sighting i was looking out my window at the stars
2. what made me notice the object was the repeating cycle of how many i saw over and over changing directions with each one i saw.
3. at first i thought it might have been a plane but saw no colored lights. it looked shiny and kept getting more bright. and then another one was following underneath in the same direction. suddenly the one on the top headed right (when it was heading left to begin with ) and the one that was going right (underneath it) started left. the 3rd one i spotted was hovering in the distance over the horizon. i kept a steady eye on it and next thing i know it was dropping down and i lost sight of it. i have had plenty of sightings in the past week with one witness that was over for a visit. my reactions are always the same. always in shock and i know i'm not stupid and thinking that a airplane is a ufo. i know what i see is indeed a ufo.

the footage i took was from inside my room out the window. hard to see but it's very bright and does not have any flashing green or red lights. the footage was taken 3 days ago ( last time i saw it)
content.summary: The object was being followed by another bright light and then switched directions

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving from damascus to germantown and i look up briefly in the sky about 2 miles from germantown in the night sky and see an arrowhead shaped light appear in thin air and then disapear. i didnt know what to think at first and barely paid any attention but realized,  that was a ufo. i still looked to the sky and saw a plane flying in a path perpendicular to the ufo flight path. it was a shutter down my spine what i believed i saw. it lasted about a second more more. it was very interesting and disturbing at the same time. i wondered if anyone else was able to witness it before it disapeared into thin air.

it was a pointed arc that was there, and disapeared. flew straight into the night sky at what looked close to light speed. i have seen jets and this was faster than anything i have ever witnessed in my life.
content.summary: Germantown maryland arrowhead light

content.detailedDescription:
This event happened two nights in a row the first night jan. 4th 2015 7:05 pm. a very bright star like object moving across the western horizon in a straight line as it moved south to north for several moments then the light began to fade until completely gone but not out my range of sight.

on jan. 5th 2015 6:50 pm the same thing except the object was directly over head and much brighter with no trail behind it or variance in brightness or color until it started to fade to black. i could not tell the distance away from me as i said it looked like a star. no flashing lights were apparent like an airplane. i tried to take a video of it but could not see it through the lens. 

i am located below a major flight path and see many planes go over there was no mistaking this for a jet it was to large and to bright and no sound. 

 sorry no photos or video
content.summary: Star like object moving across the sky south to north after a few moment it faded and disapeared

content.detailedDescription: While my workmate and i  where sitting in our van having lunch we both noticed the object come into our view then sort of hover and morph in shape so i decided to try and snap a few shots below are the ones i was able to get of the object.The whole incident lasted about 5-7mins on a clear spring afternoon visiability was excellent as you can see not really much else i can say .Apart from new zealand only has a small airforce and they are all based in the north island not the south and it was emitting no vapour trial or no sound plus its movement was nothing i have seen plus planes don't hover for a  few  minutes then take off at  speed .Anyway photo's are their for  you all to see i haven't marked the images but you cansee then quite clearly ...
content.summary: Lucnhtime observation

content.detailedDescription: While sitting outside my job in my work van.My workmate and i observed the object while having lunch.At first we thought it was just cloud morphing into different shapes.But after maybe 2-3mins of looking at it i decided to take out my cellphone and snap a few images wasn't until later going through my phone i observed the object.I think that these are quite good pictures i have a habit of photograghing some quite good one's especically last year (2014) anyway that about sums up my report.Photos 092,097,101 are of the object.092 it is just above street lamp center of picture.097 bottom right of picture by the sun.101 above open van door very clear and picture 044 was just taken one afternoon.
content.summary: While sitting inside my work van i noticed object to west north direction then heading east all the while my workmate and i obsverved this during our lunchbreak.Sighting lasted maybe 5-7mins on clear spring afternoon.

content.detailedDescription: About a month ago i noticed a odd flashing light in the sky. at the time i thought it must be a plane or radio tower light. a couple days later i saw the same lights (in a different location) that was when i noticed that there were numerous objects. since then ive seen then every night! id come to think that they must be natural. but tonight i saw them move for the first time. no noise just a slow steady hovering movement to the east. also tonight was the first time one was close enough to get a good look. i have no clue whats going on. what i do know is that they are up there every night dozens of them. please send someone out here to look at this. at this time ive shown hundreds of people. none of them have said im crazy. please get in contact with me.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: I have been seeing tringle shaped objects im the sky for almost a month strairt every night it is ongoing

content.detailedDescription:
Two fireballs fell towards earth seemingly in freefall. one had a flaming tail, the other was just engulfed in flame. it looked like large debris entering atmosphere. they fell for about 1 minute (after i had noticed) before the lower one gained a tail and they both changed direction to move horizontally. one slowly trailed off to the west, the other traveled southwest. they were very far away (lots of miles), but the flame made them look like a very close, very slow moving meteor...That changed direction.
overall time watched: 8-10 minutes.
not captured on video as i was traveling on hwy 54 westbound but did not stop in traffic.
did stop at the corner of 54 and little road to get gas. the southwest heading fireball was visible for longer than the westbound.
i hope someone in the gulf got some pictures...
content.summary: Two direction changing fireballs.

content.detailedDescription: I was making a delivery in fairfield ca at travis afb. after my delivery i got turned around and got lost. well i came upon this plane and thought i would snap a few pictures. later after i had left and was sending them to a family member i noticed something above the plane. when i show people they think its just a bug on the window, but i dont think so. im not sure what it is and would really like to find out. btw when we got to the gate the afb was on emergency shutdown and we couldnt enter for 2 hours.
content.summary: Im an otr driver and i made a delivery to travis afb in fairfield ca. i took these pictures and didnt notice anything until i was showing someone. i didnt even see this until later.

content.detailedDescription: I saw the same or same type of aircraft twice: one heading west and one headed north. they were both over the same location: my school out my back gate. the first time i saw it it was after school school when i was walking home. i got my ipod out of my house when i got home and went out my front door to videotape it. but when i got out there the aircraft was gone. but their was an passenger plane or atleast what looked like a passenger plane soon afterwords. i stayed out there for a few more minits to try and see it agean but didn't have any luck. the second time i saw it it was before school, this time heading north. i staired up at it for about two minites until i looked down and looked back up agean and lost track agean. both times i saw it by looking up in the sky as i do every day. and i know i wasn't seeing things becuase on the news their were the same type of objects exept their were two this time. as well with my case, they were both over a school as well.
content.summary: A non colored egg-shaped airecraft in the sky

content.detailedDescription: It was me and my two buddies heading back from the store for food cause we had just got done hunting and on our way home from eating when i saw it in the sky thinking not much of it at first. then when i pointed it out and all 3 of us were trying to figure out what "we" have that could move like it did. one of my friends with us was a firm no such thing as aliens or ufo's person and he was dumbfounded and boggled by what all 3 of our eyes were seeing. i was in the middle of a small truck my friend to my right "the passenger side" tried to get this recorded on his phone which was of good quality but just couldn't make out the lights in the sky. so we just watched it while driving this stretch of country road, while in amazement of what we was seeing (although) looking back we coulda crashed cause of those lights. after 6-10 minutes of watching these spherical shaped triangular arrangement of lights dance in the sky going up and down side to side but in uniform and then one by one the lights almost seemed to flicker out then after they were all gone we saw one appear again then 5-10 seconds later it also left and nothing showed back up after that. we tried ever reasonable explanation but i can tell you as a logical person not quick to rush to judgment that this was something no one unless maybe government high ups know what this object could be... i'm not saying i know it was alien  but all 3 of us who witnessed it all agreed if it's not out of this world object then it has to be super high tech government tech like has never before been seen by at least the publics naked eye. i had saw the exact same object on  film on television not long after it happened and funny enough the video was right around halloween just the same as us but two year after the fact. except the one i saw on tv was witnessed by hundreds not just 3, and filmed and i believe it was just north of me in michigan if i remember right. it was caught on camera eerie and alien. also i know a lot of people i know and on the video were saying the way it went out had to be a flare, but i know from simple gravity once flares are released they don't move in uniform up and down and side to side.
content.summary: 3 spherical lights pulsating in many colors and moving in and out up and down changing the type of triangle it formed at the time.

content.detailedDescription: The night i saw this craft, i was looking at the eastern sky. i saw a three pronged light system through the tree line. i saw this craft rise above the tree line in a ten oclock direction. the maneuver would look like a partial u if you were to draw it. i walked inside and asked another individual to come look at this object. once both the individual and i were outside, he immediately said, i have no idea what that is. while he said this, the object had three more lights appear and looked to be a part of the object, but these lights began to flash blue, red, and green in unison. so the three new lights would all flash red, blue, then green. unlike the pronged light system, these lights stayed white.  the individual walked back inside because they were under dressed for the cold weather. i thought it was a plane with their landing lights on. then a few minutes later i heard barking and howling in the direction this object was coming from. the barking and howling began to come closer to me as if it was like a wave. eventually the dogs around my position were barking and howling as well. but as soon as this started, it ended in the same fashion it began, like a wave. the object continued its course west in my direction and eventually flew above my position. when it flew above me, it had little to no sound. what sound i did hear was a hum, but i could hear my air conditioning unit from behind my house over the hum.  i could make out a tail fin and the lights i described before. the tail fin light was green, another light was red that looked like it was part of a wing, and i could still see the three pronged lights underneath the craft. once the craft was above a tree i could tell it was just as large as that tree, if not, bigger than the tree. the craft then changed course by banking right to a north-western direction. when it did this i saw the other side of the craft and the light on that side was red as well. once it finished its course correction, i could see the back of the craft which looked like it had an exhaust like a jet that was orange and red in color. i could still see the two red and single green lights in their same positions, but no longer could i see the three pronged light system underneath. it finally went over the north-western horizon and i could no longer see it.
content.summary: The craft had little to no sound. i could hear my air condintioning unit behind my house over the craft.

content.detailedDescription: On road and reading a very bright light  formed a enemy missile    it appeared out of nowhere and was heading for cuba i panicked it dissapeared
content.summary: In school bus
